modName: The devil teaches us his tricks... ENG_Version - DELETED
summary:
...but not how to "Carry" them!
A simple tweak of the 2 lesser power of Dragonborn DLC "Blackmarket" and "Secret servant".
descriptionHtml:
This mod does:

A simple tweak of the 2 lesser power of Dragonborn DLC "Blackmarket" and "Secret servant".

-Dremora merchant gets 6666 golds for trade.
-Dremora servant gets 666 of carrying capacity.

Because let's face it, how do common mortals get much higher values for trading and trasporting than an immortal demon who serve a daedric prince?

I've tested the other italian version and was fine, i've changed strings for the english version and they should work, let me know if there are any issues, you will find all installation detail in the readme.

Obiouvsly, DRAGONBORN DLC REQUIRED.
author: Alaebasta

files.name: Evil makes pots and carries it too ENG_Version
